label: A5B10C2_mP68_14_5e_10e_2e-001
title: Stoiberite [Cu$_{5}$O$_{2}$(VO$_{4}$)$_{2}$] Structure
comments: Stoiberite is related to \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B7C10D2_hP21_143_2a_2abcd_2b2c2d_bc-001}{averievite}, and similar structures (Botana 2018; Kornyakov, 2021) are often referred to as averievite. All consist of arrays of VO$_{4}$ tetraheda connected by copper and oxygen, and many structures include additional elements.  We have collected an number of these structures, towit: \begin{itemize} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A5B10C2_mP68_14_5e_10e_2e-001}{Stoiberite}, Cu$_{5}$(VO$_{4}$)$_{2}$ (this structure), \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A18B15C10D2_hP45_164_ij_abcdei_2di_d-001}{(ClCu)$_{2}$Cu$_{5}$O$_{2}$(VO$_{4}$)$_{2}$}, \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B7C10D2_hP21_143_2a_2abcd_2b2c2d_bc-001}{Cu$_{5}$O$_{2}$(VO$_{4}$)$_{2}$$\cdot$CuCl$_{2}$}, \item \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C5D10E2_hP21_164_a_bc_de_2di_d-001}{(CsCl)Cu$_{5}$O$_{2}$(PO$_{4}$)$_{2}$}, \item \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C5D10E2_mP40_14_a_e_c2e_5e_e-001}{Monoclinic (CsCl)Cu$_{5}$O$_{2}$(VO$_{4}$)$_{2}$}, \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B7C10D20E4_hP86_147_ae_c2g_d3g_2d6g_dg-001}{Trigonal (CsCl)Cu$_{5}$O$_{2}$(VO$_{4}$)$_{2}$}, and \item \href{current_web_home_dir/AB5C2D10E2_mC80_15_e_e2f_f_5f_f-001}{(KBr)Cu$_{5}$O$_{2}$(VO$_{4}$)$_{2}$}. \end{itemize}
